sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import NoImage from '../images/no_image.jpg' import { IMAGE_BASE_URL, POSTER_SIZE } from '../../config' import { StyledActor } from '../styles/StyledActor' const Actor = ({ actor }) => ( {actor.name} {actor.character} ) Actor.propTypes = { actor: PropTypes.string } export default Actor
